anti_patterns.rule: No NUMERIC_SCALE items omit the validator.
No NUMERIC_SCALE item omits points on choices.

validators_common: Mandatory (allowempty="false") is used on function interference items (qaqi).
choice_authoring: All numeric_scale items have 11 choices ranging from 0 to 10.
Points are always numeric and match the display value.
Display text may include descriptive anchors (e.g. '0 - no pain' '10 - pain as bad as you can imagine').
Val and display may differ (e.g. val='0 - no pain' display='0 - no pain').

examples.label: Please use the scales below to indicate your feelings about treatment.
